MIN INT16
===
> Minimum signed 16-bit integer.

<!-- <usage> -->
## Usage

``` javascript
var INT16_MIN = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/int16-min' );
```

#### INT16_MIN

Minimum signed 16-bit integer.

``` javascript
INT16_MIN === (-1 * Math.pow(2,15));
```
<!-- </usage> -->

<!-- <examples> -->
## Examples

``` javascript
var INT16_MIN = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/int16-min' );

console.log( INT16_MIN );
// returns -32768
```
<!-- </examples> -->
